statements: SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, supplier_location, carbon_footprint FROM SupplyChainData;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier_name='ABC Suppliers';
SELECT product_name, supplier_location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT id, supplier_name, carbon_footprint FROM SupplyChainData ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM SupplyChainData GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_name, supplier_location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE carbon_footprint < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier_location='New York' AND carbon_footprint < 200 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier_location='California' OR supplier_location='Texas' ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, carbon_footprint FROM SupplyChainData WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_optimization
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.5
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC
SELECT company_name, energy_consumption FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_optimization JOIN sustainability_metrics ON supply_chain_optimization.product_name = sustainability_metrics.company_name
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE carbon_footprint > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, production_location FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE carbon_footprint < 30 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE energy_consumption >= 100 AND waste_reduction <= 10 ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC
SELECT company_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE sustainability_rating > 8
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT supplier_id, name, region FROM Supplier ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM Shipment WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sent) AS total_quantity_sent FROM Shipment GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Product WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name, s.name AS supplier_name, sh.shipment_date FROM Product p JOIN Supplier s ON p.product_id = sh.product_id JOIN Shipment sh ON sh.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT p.name, sh.quantity_sent, sh.delivery_status FROM Product p JOIN Shipment sh ON p.product_id = sh.product_id WHERE sh.delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE delivery_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT supplier_name, email, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT shipment_id, carrier, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email, address FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, target_value FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM ProductInfo ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM SupplierInfo WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM ProductInfo WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM SupplierInfo WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductInfo JOIN InventoryLevels ON ProductInfo.product_id = InventoryLevels.product_id WHERE quantity < 10;

SELECT metric_name, reported_value, reporting_date FROM SustainabilityMetrics JOIN SustainabilityReports ON SustainabilityMetrics.metric_id = SustainabilityReports.metric_id WHERE reported_value > target_value ORDER BY reporting_date DESC;
